fields.name: The Manxome Foe
fields.description:
"He took his vorpal sword in hand:
Long time the manxome foe he sought—
So rested he by the Tumtum tree,
And stood awhile in thought."
— Lewis Carroll
fields.intro_text: As you step out of the Main Hall, a hansom cab pulls up. The driver offers you a ride to your destination.  Soon after you are seated in the cab, you fall into a deep slumber. You awaken in a strange room, alone, with visions of kittens and chess pieces filling your head.

fields.name: You are in a Victorian parlor.  (N)
fields.description: The room is ornately furnished but has no obvious exit.  As you look around, you see a kitten walk through the mirror to the north.

fields.name: You are in the looking-glass parlor.  (N)
fields.description: The room is strangely furnished.  There is no sign of the kitten.  The only exit is to the north.

fields.name: You are in a hallway.  (N/S/W)
fields.description: The hallway runs north and south with a smaller passage to the west.

fields.name: You are in a narrow hallway.  (E/W)
fields.description: The hall extends east.  To the west is a doorway.

fields.name: You are in a small room.  (E)
fields.description: The only exit of this little room is to the east.

fields.name: You are in a garden.  (N/S)
fields.description: Tall flowers surround you.  A path runs north and south.

fields.name: You are on the king's highway.  (N/S)
fields.description: A well-paved path runs north and south.  To the south you can see a garden.  Far to the north is what appears to be a castle.

fields.name: You are on the Queen's Highway.  (N/S)
fields.description: A well-paved road extends north and south.  To the north is a castle.

fields.name: You are in the castle.  (N)
fields.description: You are in the presence room of the White Queen's castle.  The White Queen accuses you of trespassing and orders you to the woods.  The only exit is to the north.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N)
fields.description: You are in the woods north of the castle. The White Queen has locked the gates behind you. The only way to go is north, deeper into the woods.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are deep in the woods. The vegetation shifts and it is easy to lose your way. Paths lead north, east, and west.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are on an east-west path in the woods.

fields.name: You are at the base of a hill.  (E/W)
fields.description: To the north is a hill too steep to climb. Woods are in all three other directions. Paths lead east and west.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are on an east-west path in the woods.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (W)
fields.description: You are at the east end of the path. The hill to the north is still too steep to climb. The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in the wabe.  (N/W)
fields.description: A shabby fountain dominates the clearing.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are in the woods. The paths continue to shift. One could easily get lost in here. You see paths leading north and west.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N)
fields.description: Impassible mountains lie to the west.  In all other directions are woods.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N/E)
fields.description: Impassible mountains lie to the west.  Woods lie in all other directions.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are deep in the woods, trying not to get lost.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are deep in the woods. Not a creature is in sight.

fields.name: You are in the yard.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are in a well-kept yard.

fields.name: You are at the base of a hill.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are at the base of a hill that rises gradually to the east.

fields.name: You are atop a hill.  (N/E)
fields.description: Woods surround the hill on all four sides.

fields.name: You are in the garden.  (N/E)
fields.description: Tall flowers abound in this beautiful garden.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N)
fields.description: You are in the woods. To the east are impassible mountains. A trail leads north.

fields.name: You are in the garden.  (N/W)
fields.description: Tall flowers abound.  To the east are impassible mountains.

fields.name: You are at the center of the garden.  (N/W)
fields.description: Lovely tall flowers are all you can see in all directions.

fields.name: You are in the garden.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: Tall flowers abound in this beautiful garden.

fields.name: You are on the beach.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are on a beach near a small lake.

fields.name: You are on the beach.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are on a beach near a small lake.  You see scattered oyster shells.

fields.name: You are on the beach.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are by a small lake.  Oysters lie on the lake shore.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are deep in the woods.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N)
fields.description: To the west tower impassible mountains. The woods close in on all directions except for a path leading north.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are in the woods.  Impassible mountains lie to the west.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are deep in the woods. Everything looks the same. Trails lead north and east.

fields.name: You are at the entrance to the courtyard.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are in a clearing.  To the east lies a courtyard.

fields.name: You are in the courtyard.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: The courtyard exits to the east, west, and north.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are deep in the woods. Everything looks the same. Trails lead north and east.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are deep in the woods. Everything looks the same. Trails lead north and east.

fields.name: You are in the garden.  (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are at the north fringe of a garden.  Tall flowers surround you.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N)
fields.description: You are in the woods.  To the east are impassible mountains.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (W)
fields.description: You are deep in the woods. The vegetation to the north is impassible. The only way you can find is a path leading west.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (W)
fields.description: You are deep in the woods. A path leads west.

fields.name: You are in the woods  (W)
fields.description: You are deep in the woods. A path leads west.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (W)
fields.description: You are deep in the woods. A path leads west.

fields.name: You are in the woods.  (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are at an intersection. Paths lead north, south, and west. The woods seem a little thinner here.

fields.name: You are in the tulgey wood.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in the woods. Trails lead east and west.

fields.name: You are in the tulgey wood.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in the woods. Trails lead east and west.

fields.name: You are in the tulgey wood.  (E)
fields.description: You are in the woods. A trails leads east. To the north and west are mountains, too steep to climb.

fields.name: You are resting 'neath the tumtum tree.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are resting 'neath the tumtum tree, standing in uffish thought.

fields.name: You are on a path leading back to the Main Hall.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are on a quiet path.  To the north you see the Main Hall.

fields.name: Vorpal Blade
fields.description: On a pedestal before you is a gleaming sword -- the legendary Vorpal Blade.

fields.name: gold coins
fields.description: On the ground are 100 gold coins.

fields.name: club
fields.description: You see a crude club.

fields.name: bludgeon
fields.description: You see a crudely-fabricated bludgeon laying at your feet.

fields.name: unicorn horn
fields.description: A softly glowing horn has detached itself from the unicorn's brow.

fields.name: spear
fields.description: A standard spear lies on the ground.

fields.name: mace
fields.description: A bloody mace lies on the ground.

fields.name: book
fields.description: On a shelf is a copy of "Alice's Adventures Underground", by Lewis Carroll.

fields.name: egg
fields.description: On a low branch of a tree rests an egg.

fields.name: mace#
fields.description: The White Knight's mace falls to the ground.  It seems to glow faintly.

fields.name: crown
fields.description: Near the tree is a large gold crown.

fields.name: crozier
fields.description: You see a crozier, its golden head gleaming in the sunlight.

fields.name: staff
fields.description: The Red King's staff drops to the floor.

fields.name: bow
fields.description: You see a small bow and some arrows.

fields.name: jabberwock's head
fields.description: Beside the jabberwock's body lies its severed head.

fields.text: You don't have time to read the entire book right now.

fields.name: Tove1
fields.description: A tove gyres in the wabe.

fields.name: Tove2
fields.description: A slithy tove gymbles in the wabe.

fields.name: Bandersnatch
fields.description: A fruminous bandersnatch towers above you.  It is too late to shun him.

fields.name: Tweedledee
fields.description: Two jolly fat twins stand in the clearing.  They wear odd armour that appears to be made of pots and pans.

fields.name: Tweedledum
fields.description: Two jolly fat twins stand in the clearing.  They wear odd armour that appears to be made of pots and pans.

fields.name: Lion
fields.description: A lion is here, growling.

fields.name: Unicorn
fields.description: You see a unicorn fighting with the lion.

fields.name: Dragonfly
fields.description: A dragonfly sits atop a large flower.

fields.name: Horsefly
fields.description: Opposite the dragonfly is a horsefly.

fields.name: Walrus
fields.description: A walrus sits on the shore crying.  He is carrying a crozier.

fields.name: Carpenter
fields.description: Beside him stands a man dressed as a carpenter.  His face is covered with a handkerchief, and oyster shells fall from behind it.  He holds a spear.

fields.name: Red Knight
fields.description: A knight in blood-red armour stands before you.  His mace is covered with a red stain that attracts flies.

fields.name: Humpty Dumpty
fields.description: A spherical fellow sits atop the wall.

fields.name: Jubjub Bird
fields.description: An ugly bird is flying toward your head.

fields.name: Borogove
fields.description: All mimsy is the borogove, right before you.

fields.name: White Knight
fields.description: An old man in white armour has come up next to you.

fields.name: Rath1
fields.description: Two mome raths are outgrabing before your very eyes.  They seem to look on you as an intruder (wouldn't you, in their place, all things considered?).

fields.name: Rath2
fields.description: Two mome raths are outgrabing before your very eyes.  They seem to look on you as an intruder (wouldn't you, in their place, all things considered?).

fields.name: Jabberwock
fields.description: The jabberwock, with eyes ablaze, is wiffling through the tulgey wood, directly at you.

fields.name: Red King
fields.description: At your feet you see a tiny red king, small enough to fit on a chessboard.

fields.name: Waif of the Fuchsia
fields.description: Nearby you see a young plant, apparently an orphan -- the Waif of the Fuchsia.  You realize that you cannot oppose it.
